snippet.title: Serum - Official Gameplay Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Serum is an action survival first-person shooter developed by Game Island. Players will discover the power of the vital liquid that can prolong their existence, amplify their abilities, and enhance their hand-crafted arsenal of deadly weaponry as they uncover a government conspiracy. Explore a devastated world filled with mutated creatures and set traps to put a stop to them. Serum is available now for PC in Steam Early Access.

#Serum #Gameplay #IGN
